definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

sentences.english: Love will make your life easier to pass, until one day you can breath no more.
sentences.chinese: 爱将使您的生活通过，直到一天您没能呼吸。

sentences.english: I always love you and this love will never fade .
sentences.chinese: 我总是那么爱你，我的爱将永远不会退去。

sentences.english: If it is your time, love will track you down like a cruise missile.
sentences.chinese: 如果是您的时间，爱将跟踪您击倒象寻呼台”。

sentences.english: Our love will lait as long as our lives.
Hate got me into prison, love is goanna break me out.
sentences.chinese: 仇恨使我进了监狱，爱将使我重获自由。

sentences.english: Because my love is come to me．
sentences.chinese: 因为我的爱将来到我身旁。

sentences.english: My love will always be waiting right here.
sentences.chinese: 我的爱将永远在这里等待的权利。

sentences.english: Hatred confuses life; love harmonizes it. Hatred darkens life;
sentences.chinese: 仇恨把生活搅乱，爱将其协调。

sentences.english: Satisfaction, Joy, Pleasure & love will be the outcome of the passion.
sentences.chinese: 满足，欢乐，希望与爱将是激情的结果。

sentences.english: And so thy thoughts , when thou art gone , love itself shall slumber on.
sentences.chinese: 你一旦离去，对你的思念，爱将恬睡在你的心房。

sentences.english: This love will enrich both your lives and make you both happier.
sentences.chinese: 你的爱将会丰富你们两人的生活，使你们更加幸福。

sentences.english: The darkness will lift and full spectrum love shall be anchored.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗将会驱除，而全谱的爱将会被锚定。

sentences.english: Undying love will continue for centuries till we are old to death.
sentences.chinese: 不朽的爱将永世长存知道我们老去。

sentences.english: Love's gonna find a way back to you, yeah.
sentences.chinese: 爱将会找到办法回到你身边，是的。

sentences.english: A teacher likes putting a watch on his / her desk while lecturing .
sentences.chinese: 老师讲课时总爱将手表放在讲台上。

sentences.english: In the next two years, the love of power will begin to be displaced by the power of love.
sentences.chinese: 接下来两年里，对权力的爱将开始被爱的能量所取代。

definition: to regard sth as valuable/to think highly of (a younger person, a subordinate etc)
under one's control or administration/subordinates/(money etc) on hand/sb's financial means/to take action
to put in an important position
commander-in-chief, the equivalent of king in Chinese chess
fierce general/valiant military leader/fig. brave individual
